definition: value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: Our Tax programme provides an introduction to CGT on shares - we explain the basic principles of CGT calculations on the sale of shares by individuals.
sentences.chinese: 解释资本增值税的基本原则及售卖股份后的计算方法。

sentences.english: At the same time, confirm the VAT payable.
sentences.chinese: 同时，确认应纳增值税额。

sentences.english: Value added tax shares duty for country and place, execute cent to become.
sentences.chinese: 增值税为国家和地方共享税，实行分成。

sentences.english: But they do not understand how a VAT works.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们并不理解增值税的运行原理。

sentences.english: Secondly, the introduction of land value increment tax.
sentences.chinese: 钻井政策“漏洞”，不及时清算土地增值税。

sentences.english: Certificate of payment of value-added tax or export goods tax-paid slip.
sentences.chinese: 增值税税收缴款书或出口货物完税分割单。

sentences.english: Chapter Four Object of Land Value Increment Tax and Project Benefiting charge Collection.
sentences.chinese: 第四章土地增值税与工程受益费的课征对象。

sentences.english: A capital-gains tax and a valued-added tax had been brought in, and the double taxation of dividends ended.
sentences.chinese: 政府推行资本税和增值税，终结分红的双倍税。

sentences.english: Four, drilling policy "loopholes" and not to the timely liquidation of land value increment tax.
sentences.chinese: 钻井政策“漏洞”，不及时清算土地增值税。

sentences.english: Lower the value-added tax and business tax threshold for small businesses.
sentences.chinese: 提高小型微型企业增值税和营业税起征点。

sentences.english: Part 2 research in the behaviors of fraudulent special VAT invoicing.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，虚开增值税专用发票罪之虚开行为的研究。

sentences.english: Study on the Development Strategy of Transportation Industry Based on Input-Output Analysis;
sentences.chinese: 对交通运输业改征增值税的必要性和可行性进行分析。

sentences.english: VAT is the standard form of indirect tax paid throughout the European Union.
sentences.chinese: 在整个欧盟内，增值税是标准的间接税。

sentences.english: We will fully implement VAT reform and the reform of taxes and fees for refined petroleum products.
sentences.chinese: 全面实施增值税转型改革和成品油税费改革。

sentences.english: Many are braced for the first squeeze on the economy when VAT is increased at midnight tomorrow night.
sentences.chinese: 当增值税在明晚上升，许多都挤在第一个经济周期内。

sentences.english: What are the circumstances may issue special invoices for value-added tax?
sentences.chinese: 哪些情形可以开具增值税专用发票？

definition: to claim a credit against/tax reduction
personal income tax (abbr. for 個人所得稅|个人所得税)
to pay a tax one has evaded/to pay an overdue tax
